Cards.Intro_Paragraph: I don't just write code; I architect solutions. Leveraging 6 years of dental laboratory precision to build pixel-perfect, high-performance software for startups and enterprises.
Cards.ObsessedWithDetail_Paragraph: My background in dental prosthetics taught me that a single millimeter matters. I bring that same rigor to my code.

SelectedWork.Subtitle: From concept to production—real projects solving real problems.

TechStack.Subtitle: Technologies I use to build production-ready applications, built for precision and scalability.

Evolution.Curiosity_P1: 10 years old. Pentium 4. Trying to understand how games worked.
Evolution.Precision_P1: Dental labs. Every crown, every bridge—0.1mm accuracy or failure.
Evolution.Precision_P2: Learned: Details aren't details. They're everything.
Evolution.Transition_P1: Back to code. But different. I brought the craftsman mindset with me.
Evolution.Execution_P1: Two degrees. Completed Computer Science bachelor with 93.8% GPA. Product built and sold.
Evolution.Execution_P2: All while working full-time. No excuses.
Evolution.Building_P1: Enterprise software. Healthcare SaaS. Real problems. Real users.
Evolution.Building_P2: No more toy projects. Building for production.

Testimonials.Title: Collaboration Log
Testimonials.Subtitle: Feedback from founders, engineers, and stakeholders I've built systems with.

1.Name: Sarah Jenkins
1.Quote: Ali transformed our manual workflow into a seamless digital engine. The precision in his architecture saved us roughly 20 hours a week in administrative overhead. He doesn't just code; he solves business problems.

2.Name: David Chen
2.Quote: I've reviewed a lot of code, and Ali's PRs are a masterclass in clean architecture. He builds systems that are boring in the best way possible—predictable, scalable, and impossible to break.

3.Name: Marcus Rodriguez
3.Quote: We needed an MVP in 3 months. Ali delivered a production-ready system in 2. His ability to navigate between frontend polish and database optimization is rare.

Healthcare.Title: Healthcare Software Specialist

AboutMe.Subtitle: From Dental Labs To Software Engineering
AboutMe.HeroTitle: Full Stack Developer and Dental Technician

Biography.Title: Biography
Biography.P1: I'm Ali, a full-stack engineer with a strong focus on building practical, high-impact software. My background in both technology and medical environments taught me how to solve real-world problems with clarity, structure, and a calm, analytical mindset. Whether I'm architecting a SaaS system, designing a UI, or optimizing backend logic, I care about the details that make a product dependable, efficient, and pleasant to use.
Biography.P2: Outside of code, I'm someone who enjoys learning deeply, simplifying complex ideas, and creating things that feel intentional. I love systems thinking, clean design, and the craft behind turning an idea into something functional and polished. Every project I work on—big or small—is an opportunity to improve, refine my approach, and deliver something meaningful.

Stats.Achievement_Desc: Built and sold an Enterprise product

Differentiators.Title: What Makes This Different
Differentiators.Card1_Desc: Six years creating dental restorations taught me that perfection isn't optional—it's the baseline.
Differentiators.Card2_Desc: I don't learn your industry—I lived it. Real workflows. Real problems. Real solutions.
Differentiators.Card3_Desc: Not just coding tutorials. Built a product. Sold it. Supported real users. That's the difference.
